fields.title: Fantastic treatment, couldn't be happier
fields.content: I came in to the hospital with a broken hand and I asked the doctor "Will I be able to play the piano when it has healed" and he said "Yes" and we laughed because I couldn't play the piano before but now it has healed and I can play the piano and ...

fields.question: Was the area you were treated in clean?
Was the area you were treated in clean?
Were you kept informed about your treatment?
Were you kept informed about your treatment?
